content.detailedDescription: It was approximately 1340 est in afternoon on sunday april 15th.  i was at an open field flying a kite with my daughter.  the weather conditions were partly cloudy and breezy.  i was less than 100 yards from rt161 (4 lane highway) south of the highway.  the sun was shining on my back if i was looking north at the highway. the wind, since i was flying a kite, was usually blowing from the sw to ssw, which put my kite usually between where i was standing and the highway. there are two high power transmission lines with towers approx 200 ft high running parallel to each other separated by approx 350 ft.  as i was flying the kite the wind lulled for a second and the kite fell to the ground.  i walked to retrieve the kite and began to wind back up the string.  as i was doing that i looked up in the sky.  and that's when i saw it.  it had already passed over the transmission lines (assuming) to the west of my position and was heading almost due e to ene, almost parallel to rt161 but less than 1/5-1/6 mile north from my position and 161. at first i thought it was a helicopter, but with it being that close i could not see rotors or blades.  with the traffic on the highway all i heard were the vehicles.  as i stared more intently i noticed the object, which appeared to be the shape of a taller hockey puck (the radius was longer than the height {about twice as}) was spinning.  i could definitely make out the spinning (sunglasses helped filter sun light) and it seemed to spin at a constant rate.  the sun, which is still low in the sky and was shining at my back and thus i was between the object and the sun, reflected very brightly on certain sections of the spinning object.  there was a section that was dull then the object would spin some more and hit a highly bright reflexion and spun some more and would be dull again.  the pattern repeated.  judging by the size of the object (about 40ft-50ft in diameter/20 ft high) my guess there was two highly reflection parts and two dull parts spinning.  revolving on cycle in about 3/4 sec.  since i had the highway traffic as a reference, the object was moving much less than the highway traffic.  possible 25 mph.  the object continued spinning and moving almost due e ne where it passed over the next set of transmission power lines to the east of my position.  compared the the height of the transmission tower, the object was around 10% of the height of the tower over the lines (it was very close about 20-30ft). after that point it traveled beyond my view. the object was in my view for what seemed like a minute (due to shock) but in reality was in my view for around 30 sec.  it took me 10 sec just to grasp i wasn't watching a helicopter.  it was in almost entirely in my field of view (if 0 deg is my left arm out to my side and 180 deg is my rt arm out ... saw it at 30 deg and lost sight at 150 deg); and there were no trees or obstructions in my way at all.  i left my house without my camera phone. getting a kid and dog together to leave i forgot to put it in my pocket.  witnesses?  my wife and a friend was 100 ft south of me talking to each other and watching our and their dogs playing (the dogs were south of them so they were looking the complete opposite way).  i should have yelled for my wife, but i was just staring and couldn't get my eyes off of it.  i was studying the object, trying to gain as much info and detail as i can. the highly reflective part shining back at me fascinated me. man i wish i had my phone. man i wish i yelled for my wife.  but i just stared. i probably wouldn't have grabbed my phone anyway.  i was locked on it.
content.summary: Spinning puck shaped object

content.detailedDescription: I was at at a golf course in alameda on sat 4/14/12 (approx. 3pm)and one of the guys i was playing with just hit his drive and he said "i popped it up".... so i looked up and i saw this white object that looked like a golf ball. and i looked at it and looked at it and it didn't move. mind you it was really windy(25-30 mph gusts) and not a cloud in the sky. yet this object did not move or even make a noise. so i turned to the rest of our group and i said jokingly " hey i thought that was your ball" as i pointed towards the object in the sky. everyone stood and stared at this object not knowing what to say or think....I hesitated and then i said "i didn't think you could see saturn today."..As we were golfing next to an airport it was quite clear this was not a plane or helicopter. as it had no obvious sign of direction, did not appear to make a sound and did i mention it looked like a golf ball. we proceeded down the fairway and it did not move, much like you would expect from looking at the moon. when we got to the green (aprox. 1 minute later)we all looked around and it had vanished. it was no where to seen...We looked and looked as if expecting to see that it was just a ballon or blimp or anything. but it was gone........
content.summary: Golf ball like object seen hovering, no sounds

content.detailedDescription: I was at at a golf course in alameda on sat 4/14/12 (approx. 3pm)and one of the guys i was playing with just hit his drive and he said "i popped it up".... so i looked up and i saw this white object that looked like a golf ball. and i looked at it and looked at it and it didn't move. mind you it was really windy(25-30 mph gusts) and not a cloud in the sky. yet this object did not move or even make a noise. so i turned to the rest of our group and i said jokingly " hey i thought that was your ball" as i pointed towards the object in the sky. everyone stood and stared at this object not knowing what to say or think....I hesitated and then i said "i didn't think you could see saturn today."..As we were golfing next to an airport it was quite clear this was not a plane or helicopter. as it had no obvious sign of direction, did not appear to make a sound and did i mention it looked like a golf ball. we proceeded down the fairway and it did not move, much like you would expect from looking at the moon. when we got to the green (aprox. 1 minute later)we all looked around and it had vanished. it was no where to seen...We looked and looked as if expecting to see that it was just a ballon or blimp or anything. but it was gone........
content.summary: Golf ball like object seen hovering, no sounds

content.detailedDescription:
I have lived in winnie most of my life.
i have seen on several occasions unusual lights off hwy 73.
i have always attributed them to planes or helicopters due to the
strategic petroleum reserve located in the area.

now i am questioning that since i read the person's account on feb. 16th this year.

my son also called me at work one night because something the size of a 727 flew and hovered very low over our home.  there were no lights, and he was 20 years old, and frightened enough to ask me to come home.  

i thought he had been watching too much tv?  he is an army reservist, and has since been to iraq, with less fear than what he says he experienced that night.
content.summary: Have seen many unusual lights

content.detailedDescription:
I heard a thumping noise on the roof (?), and went to ask if my housemate had heard it. he had, so i stepped out onto the porch to listen, and in the distance i saw a very bizarre light in the sky. (no, i haven't been drinking. nor am i on intoxicants of any kind, and i have a fellow witness!) with the naked eye it looked like just a pulsing light hovering above the treeline, making a few sharp darting movements. through binoculars (nikon 8x40 8.2) it was a ball/cluster of strobing led looking red, amber, green (at least 15-20 individual lights, all flashing in no sequence or order). it moved left. went below treeline for a moment, came up, moved right, went below treeline again, came back up farther to the right, moved a bit back left, went down below treeline and was gone. 
it was west of my location, i'm guessing near lake allatoona/cartersville. observed it from around 11:24 to 11:33...
content.summary: Looked like red "twinkling star" but not a star (moved). got binoculars and saw multicolored ledish lights flashing randomly.

content.detailedDescription: Came out of the kitchen at 11:30 am and look at the sky and saw two object ( spheres) stay there for a few second and called my daughter to come out to seethe two objects but she did not see the objects they where far away already try to focus more if they where birds but no flaping of wings they they made into one and disapeared. this is not the first time i see this spheres on another day me and my dad saw a silver changing shape and color disc in the same area going into the opposive direction of the wind. i am allways looking into the sky for obejects or ufos
content.summary: Two spheres close toghter than turn in to one and desapeared all lasted for at least 1 to 1 1/2 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
The image appears in lower right side of attached picture, we have a few photos showing the object of varying coverage by clouds - no airplanes or helicopters were in the area at time of picture...

please help us identify the object!  the moon was not full yesterday as well...
content.summary: Strange orb in hawaii

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were driving north on 59 around 10am, sunday may 8, 2011.  i noticed a dark object hovering near the tree line over the area of new caney high school.  it looked very dense and was about the size of a suburban, but had an oval-like shape.  it's surface was not smooth, but had many bumps and ridges.  i asked my family if they could see what i was seeing.  at least four of us saw it.  it never moved and the whole sighting did not last very long as we were driving past it and traveling away from it.  as my curiosity peaked, i insisted we turn the vehicle around at fm 1485 to get a better look, but one family member became very upset, so we did not go back.
content.summary: Driving north on 59 around 10am, sunday may 8, 2011.  i noticed a dark object hovering near the tree line over the area of new caney high school.

content.detailedDescription: I fly model rockets,and i am interested in aviation.Sunday was a windy day so we bought a kite.My girlfriend & i were flying the kite at snowden elem. school athletic field.This is in a glide path for our airport.We observed many large aircraft on close approach,landing in high wind conditions(engines rev up&down).Across the field aprox.350ft.Were trees aprox.150ft. high,as we faced north,(air traffic was flying north to south).My kite was tangled in a tree top when an object caught my eye.I tried to get my girlfriend's eyes trained on the object but it was behind the trees before she could see it.I saw a silver/grey disc that appeared to be over northeast memphis.The disc moved in a very straight line,at a steady speed,north-northwest,parallel to the horizon.This would have been flying into air traffic.The object was too far away to make size,speed,altitude observations.But,if i had to guess,based on my rocketry observations,the object was over north east memphis,500-1000ft.,moving 200-300mph,in a very steady straight line.I don't know what it was,but i know what it wasn't.We may have a photo,but we have dozens of photos to go thru.
content.summary: Observed disc,moving,straight line above tree tops.

content.detailedDescription: My son's friend who goes to college in arkansas, texted him and said he th ought he witnessed a ufo. my son then looked out his upstairs window that was facing east and saw a bright yellow moving light in the sky that was moving down over the horizon. he took a picture of it on his cell phone and came down and showed it to me. we got in my car and tried to see it again, but did not see it, there are large trees in our neighborhood. he said it was not a meteor or aircraft. do you have anymore sightings of this?
content.summary: My son received message from friend in ark about ufo, my son then looked out our upstairs window and took a picture of the object on cell phone

content.detailedDescription: Three ships altogether, and one small red orb going around the large one. this happend at 1015 in upstate new york. ship followed 2 people in car then followed the car home after dropping off the person that lived 1 mile away .Then the  ship  broke into a smaller one that came over the house with no sound. the larger ship landed about a mile away, the other person at the other house saw the object very clear. her statment was.. this ship has spokes on it and it is very large and has a red orb going around it.. the ships joined togeather and faded away
content.summary: Holly crap

content.detailedDescription: I was having lunch, alone, in my car at 11:25am when i observed an object that was traveling towards me at a distance of 15 miles.(estimate) i thought at the time it was a banner that was being towed behind a plane. i thought at the time that it kind of fluttered.I initially thought it was stationary untill it turned to it's left, my right, heading north. that is when i searched for the plane that i thought should have been towing this. i did not see anything else. this object was a rectangle,a light solid color, a light grey. what was strange was that it was a rectangle when it was traveling toward me. this all happened in denver, colorado on 10-30-2011. i was parked across the street from a golf course. i took a few photo's with my phone.I was going to try to follow it, but realized it was a good distance away, and i did not think i could drive safe, in lunch time traffic and keep an eye on it. i did pull forward and take a few more pictures. it seemed to speed up slightly, the farther away it got. that is when i lost sight of it. this took maybe 5 minutes or less. i then looked at the pictures i took, not really seeing anything, i began to zoom in on the picture, and kept the new pictures. i was able to at least get the shape of the object. i did watch the news and newspapers the next few days,although i did not see any reports of anything unusual. i have found a few reports of rectangles in the denver area, but not on my date. i will send the best pictures, but they are from a phone camera taken at a distance.
content.summary: Object appeared to be traveling toward me, then turned and traveled parallel

content.detailedDescription: I was having lunch, alone, in my car at 11:25am when i observed an object that was traveling towards me at a distance of 15 miles.(estimate) i thought at the time it was a banner that was being towed behind a plane. i thought at the time that it kind of fluttered.I initially thought it was stationary untill it turned to it's left, my right, heading north. that is when i searched for the plane that i thought should have been towing this. i did not see anything else. this object was a rectangle,a light solid color, a light grey. what was strange was that it was a rectangle when it was traveling toward me. this all happened in denver, colorado on 10-30-2011. i was parked across the street from a golf course. i took a few photo's with my phone.I was going to try to follow it, but realized it was a good distance away, and i did not think i could drive safe, in lunch time traffic and keep an eye on it. i did pull forward and take a few more pictures. it seemed to speed up slightly, the farther away it got. that is when i lost sight of it. this took maybe 5 minutes or less. i then looked at the pictures i took, not really seeing anything, i began to zoom in on the picture, and kept the new pictures. i was able to at least get the shape of the object. i did watch the news and newspapers the next few days,although i did not see any reports of anything unusual. i have found a few reports of rectangles in the denver area, but not on my date. i will send the best pictures, but they are from a phone camera taken at a distance.

content.detailedDescription: Dr cleve ziegler saw strange lights over the old cavendish mall in the early morning of sept 30 2010. lights were overhead, morphing from two triangles merging into a trapezoid and then back. moved erratically at high speed in all directions then just disappeared. total time of sighting was 3-4 minutes. slightly overcast. incident reported to police and apparently seen by other witnesses but exact number is unknown. eventually covered by local news station. dr ziegler was uncertain of what he saw, but experienced both fear and awe.
content.summary: Lights morphing from two triangles to trapezoid and back. moved erratically then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Dr cleve ziegler saw strange lights over the old cavendish mall in the early morning of sept 30 2010. lights were overhead, morphing from two triangles merging into a trapezoid and then back. moved erratically at high speed in all directions then just disappeared. total time of sighting was 3-4 minutes. slightly overcast. incident reported to police and apparently seen by other witnesses but exact number is unknown. eventually covered by local news station. dr ziegler was uncertain of what he saw, but experienced both fear and awe.
content.summary: Lights morphing from two triangles to trapezoid and back. moved erratically then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
When i 6 years old, i was at home playing in my backyard when my mother called me inside for lunch. i was running towards the back door when i noticed something in the sky on the left above (at very low cloud level) my neighbours house. i stopped and looked at the object for a good 15 seconds before i got scared and ran inside. 

the object was spherical, with pincer-like arms coming out of either side. there was a large black window and the rest was white with some black on the pincers.It wasn't making a sound but the pincers were moving slowly pulling at or separating a cloud. 

whilst watching the object i felt really scared so i ran inside and didn't tell anyone until i saw more ufos as an adult and understood what they were.
content.summary: Spherical ufo with pincers was stationary above my neighbours house.

content.detailedDescription: On april 11th 2012 at 1015pm  while sitting in my car near passmore and steeles in the north east part of scarborough  i noticed a cigar shaped object it was very bright with what looked like 5 smaller lights on the top of it. it was not moving and made no sound i took a pic of it with my i pod . i later fond out that a very simular object was the cause of an airport shutdown for over 4 hours at the xiaoshan airport in china on the 8th of july 2010. if you wish to see the pic you may contact me as i do not know hope to place it here in this report.
content.summary: Bright cigar shaped object with 5 lights on the top

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were walking home from the park when my friend looked up and said "whats that". i looked up and saw a circular disk with four spikes and a red spot above the powerlines in the sky above me. at first we though it was an odd-shaped balloon but we noticed it had no string and balloons don't have spikes. as we watched, the ufo moved up and down while hovering and was ascending at the same time.It got very high into the sky, making it appear star like. it hovered across for maybe 50 seconds which is when we filmed the object as it moved sideways. we stopped filming and approximately 10 seconds afterwards the object ascended straight up allowing us to make out its shape. the event left us shocked and confused. we lost sight of the object as it rose at a medium rate into the sky.
content.summary: Circular with four spikes and a red light on the underside directly in the center

content.detailedDescription:
The orb was only seen in the photos after they were taken, it was not observed in real time.  note that today, april 15th 2012 is not a full moon, and there was no airplane in the area.

please email me for pictures, i cannot download to this page.

thank you
content.summary: Strange orb in hawaii

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend was riding bikes in pelzer south carolina at 7:47pm on sunday april 15,2012 and my friend looked up and said what is that i looked and said i have no idea.  the object was hovering right to the left about 500 ft it was black triangle shaped about at a 10:00 angle in the sky not straight up then 8:00pm it was gone.
content.summary: I ryan and my friend micheal seen in the sky about where the air planes fly just hovering then about 8 pm it went away

content.detailedDescription: We were watching the top of a mountain very close to our home and we saw what appeared to be headlights then flashing blue lights and we thought it was the police. all of a sudden the flashing blue lights were in a field in front of our home. we saw numerous orbs of white, red and blue. the flashing lights grew more intense and we saw what appeared to be a white form, almost human like but it vanished as quickly as we had seen it. there was a red flash in the field across from us that appeared to be the tail of some form moving quickly across the field. we continued to see more red, white and blue orbs blinking in the field then a red orb appeared to be at the top of the mountain in front of us and as quickly as it was seen by us it came at us faster than we had time to process and right before we ran inside we both noticed it looked very insect in form by the time it got to us. we continued to see red, white and blue lights at the top of the mountain hovering up and down above and below the tree line and casting a very bright white light on the top of the mountain and suddenly they disappeared. this all took place over a two hour time span. we were both very scared but remained outside to watch this phenomena. there is absolutely no way to define these things or the way they moved silently with such speed but gave off so much light. at first we thought the white orbs were lightning bugs but later determined the size was much too great to be that. also the red flash in the field and the white flash that revealed (only for a second) what appeared to be a type of humanoid form is completely unexplainable to us.
content.summary: 2 hour time span of sightings

content.detailedDescription:
4/16/2012
around 12:37(am) my girlfriend and i were watching the sky, browsed an app on my mobile device to watch satellites, and then i looked straight up and even tho at night i started to make a shape out(12:40 am). it was directly over me heading south/west. it looked pretty large, bigger than planes i've seen before, made no sound whatsoever. it had an almost stealth bomber look(the boomerang shape), it had blurry outlines like a haze almost. very misty and black. even with the night sky, due to the light pollution, i was able to see the blackness of this object. i'd say it could've been a few hundred feet from wingtip to wingtip. it was also flying very low especially for an aircraft and judging by the height i am positive i would've heard a sound. as i watched it fly for about 6 seconds it seemed to just vanish, almost ghost like(about 30 degrees south/west). my best guess it was flying at an altitude of around 300-550 feet. there was no lights visible to blinking and behind the whole wingspan seemed to look distorted almost as heat waves come up off a road on a hot day. never seen anything like this in my life(even after living on various military bases).
content.summary: Weird shadow like boomarang disc

content.detailedDescription: This morning at about 1:10 am my 25 year old daughter and i were walking around the corner to my mother's house where my daughter lives . as we started to walk down the street we noticed a light on a telephone pole . the light would pulsate for a few seconds and then stop only to start pulsating again . as we walked we saw the light move to the cooler on top of a neighbors house and then move to a tree in the next door neighbor's yard . at first we thought the light was coming from a police car on the road but the light we saw was not red and blue . we continued to walk towards my mother's house and we watched the light move from the next door neighbor's yard to another neighbors tree . each time we passed a tree the light went to another tree . as we approached my mom's yard we saw the light near the top of two italian spruce trees that are in my mom's yard . we went into the back yard to see if we could find what was causing the light but we could not see anything that would cause the lights . as we watched though we saw the light move on to some trees that are across a horse pasture from my mom's yard . while we were standing on the porch we realized that there was no sounds coming from anywhere . there are dogs in nearly every yard and the dogs bark anytime people or other dogs walk passed but they were not barking at all . we live on a hiway and there were no sounds coming from there either . i watched until my daughter was in the house and had locked the door and then i started walking home . we couldn't explain why but the light we were seeing made us very uncomfortable . we were getting scared . but, as i walked home i took one more look to the street to see if there was a source for the light there but again i saw nothing that would have caused the light . i looked back at where the light had last been and the light was gone but just then i heard what i can only describe as a whooshing humming sound .The light has just disappeared when i heard the whooshing humming sound . we were so startled by what we had seen that we didn't think to take pictures of it but today my daughter went out to see where the light had been on the spruce trees and there is a hole in the branches of one of the trees and the branches are hanging down as though they had been bent over or broken . i don't know if that was caused by the light or whatever made the light but we never noticed that hole in the tree before .
content.summary: Pulsing or flashing light on trees and highwire

content.detailedDescription: Was heading to get some fast food on hwy 24 as i seen this yellow-orange light glowing very bright. nothing blinking at all looked to me that it was in are atmosphere so i kept staring at it while my mother drove couldnt not tell if it was moving or not. then in just a few it started to dim very slowly were i wanted to focus more to see then it dimmed so quickly i could see the outline like a lightbulb being shut off very fast. ive lived near a airport almost my whole life never seen a light vanish like that.
content.summary: Seen yellow-orange light dim alittle then vanished.

content.detailedDescription: I was waiting in my car with my kids when i decided to tape a jet far away leaving a beautiful jet stream.  a bright object appeared 5 seconds into the video - the object appeared out of nowhere and headed north at a very high speed.  not sure if it was a meteorite or something else!
content.summary: Observed an unidentified object while parked at the safeway parking lot in san mateo, ca

content.detailedDescription:
Date:  april 13, 2012
time: 2030 (approximate)
location: bethel church road (between chesapeake city, md and route 896-s)

driving home from dinner my family (mother, sister, father) and i drove south over the summit bridge on 896, and exited right toward chesapeake city, via bethel church road.  at open space at the base of the summit bridge, on the south side, a memorial service was being attended by approximately 100-200 people with candles to remember the fatal car crash that had occurred early that morning.  almost immediately after passing the memorial service and turning onto bethel church road, i noticed out my window 7-8 bright white/yellow/orange lights in the sky ahead, in sort of a zig-zag, or w like formation.  they did not appear to be moving.  they were obviously brighter and closer than stars.  they had a bit of a twinkle to their illumination, but were not blinking.  the color was mostly yellowish-white, but a bit more orange at times.  

i pointed out the lights to my family, and they all saw it.  we all tried to decide what they might be.  our first consideration was:

1.  many helicopters doing some sort of formation flight training.

we ruled this out because they did not appear to be moving, and there was no noise.  i rolled my window down to listen.

2.  candles attached to balloons, sent up by the people at the nearby memorial service on the highway.

this seemed possible, however the lights seemed much brighter than would be possible from a candle in a cup, or lantern attached to a balloon.

3.  flares attached to balloons, sent up by the people at the memorial service.

this seemed less likely.  flares might give the flamelike glow we saw, but to lift a flare, the balloons would need to be very big.  or maybe 10 balloons to lift a flare?  it seemed unlikely that the people at the memorial service would do something like that.  

additionally, the lights appeared to be approximately 1 mile west of the highway, were the people are, and not moving in their positions.  it was not especially windy at the time, so it didn't seem likely that a balloon (or many balloons) sent up by people would travel such a distance, and then remain in a formation in the sky at an altitude of roughly 500-1000 feet.

we continued on our way home, watching the lights in the sky.  at one point, we actually drove underneath the formation, so that when we looked out the window to the right, we could see the line of lights in the sky above.  this was when we were closest to them.  there was no apparent sound, and no helicopter or plane or anything but the lights were visible.  

as we turned into our development, the lights were behind us, so we could not see them for 1 minute.  when we pulled into the driveway and got out, only 1 light was visible now.  my father raced into the house to get a pair of binoculars.  while he was gone, the light slowly began to grow more dim.  by the time he got back, it was not very bright, and before he could look through the binocs, the light was gone.  

i was very excited during this whole time, because i had seen footage from ufo reports, in which a formation of lights is in the sky, sometimes for many minutes, and then disperses, or disappears, or something like this.  this seemed similar.  

i have sketched a diagram of what we saw when we first noticed the lights from the car.
content.summary: 7-8 yellowish lights in formation in sky

content.detailedDescription: Just coming home and saw 6 bright objects converging together in the sky east by north east on an approximate path over the delaware river. there were two other objects approaching from the south in route to join the first group. at that time two of the objects in the first group of six began to oscillate and move erratically at which point i immediately recognized that they were signaling to the other craft to leave the area, and i knew instinctively that these same two were about to disappear and they did. as the two from the south joined the remaining four of the first group of six two more disappeared and the were four left continuing due north two more of the group disappeared and the two remaining continued on course northward until they left from the line of sight.
content.summary: Classical ufo round-up manuver

content.detailedDescription: Around 11:35 a.M. this morning i was driving east on indiantown road in jupiter, florida.  i had just passed under hwy 95 and was attracted by flashes of light moving to the west just in front of me.  at first i thought it was a plane in distress since it looked like it was in a slow spiral.  as it turned i could not see any wings.  as it came closer to my left i could see yellow flashing lights at each end of the object flashing one then the other.  it really looked like a flying boxcar.   i was watching the road and the object and saw it move (like doing a figure 4) in the sky.  it was just under the clouds.  the sun was out and when the object turned i could see flashes of sunlight hitting the sides of this object.  the yellow lights flashed at each end as the object turned (rotated) end to end.  the flashing lights were definitely yellow.  i was in a little traffic and was obstructed by trees losing sight of it as i passed the shell station on my left.  i turned the corner but could not see the object any longer.  hope more reports are received by you.  i feel calm and would like to see it again.
content.summary: Bright light reflecting off surface- boxcar shaped-yellow flashing lights on ends, rotating end to end.

content.detailedDescription:
Last night around 8:30 in the evening i was sitting on my balcony on the beach gulf of mexico and i looked to my right and i saw a  burning yellow orange object come down about  100 feet or so flaming to be exact i thought for a moment this was a shooting star but quickly dismissed as they are white then within 10 seconds 2 more came down i was in disbelief i ran to my room and grabbed my iphone when i got back or was gone. i tried to reason withy self to what this was and just said wow what was that no sooner then a minute later is when they just started dropping from the sky i thought it was parachutes. but the way these came down were as if they were , but parachute jumpers don't  have flames on there parachutes i was in shock and facetime my sister she seen them to the best of her ability there were about four at that time she hung up and i started to record . i also thought it might have been meteor shower but they don't fall from the sky and hover then dissipate and make a right turn into horizon of gulf.
i also asked any residents in building of they say anything and they said no. i really don't have an explanation for what i these were about 10 or more or so  but i do know what i saw.
i am a type of person to have facts or reason and do not just say oh i saw a ufo i really don't know what this was but it was not anything i have ever witnessed as a human on this planet .
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Last night april 14 2012 around 8:30 in the evening i was sitting on my balcony on the gulf  mexico  i saw a very bright  flaming object fall from sky i was  in  disbelief  as i tried to rationalize  this  i am not a person to say what it was  bu
